content.icerik: Daily Care for Beautiful Feet This non-greasy, fast absorbing active foot cream is formulated to boost hydration and to help repair rough, dry feet. DermoCare Active Foot Cream restores and maintains the natural moisture levels of the skin. The vegetal anti-oxidant complex in its formula with antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and astringent properties is effective against increased foot perspiration. Enriched with antimicrobial fungistatic actives this foot cream prevents fungus and foot odor. Apply and massage on clean, dry feet.
